marklogic.body:
If the "Arab Spring" were indeed a form of spring, than all, within and without the region, would be pleased; looking forward to the true expansion of liberal democracy and the social, economic and political benefits that would come with it.
Sadly, however, the "Spring' has increasingly been viewed by observers, correctly, as a Cold, dark and bloody Winter through which the Muslim-Arab world is going.
Therefore, we shall have to wait longer, probably much longer, before true Spring finally Reaches the shores of North Africa and the Arab Middle East.
